content: will o the wisp size yarn women s medium 400 yards gauge lakes yarn rose hand dyed mcn in 9 stitches = 1 in stockinette winter song needles notions us size 1 / 2 50 mm circulars darning needle or size needed to obtain gauge stitch markers cuff co 64 stitches using old norwegian cast on method or using your favorite cast on divide stitches evenly on circulars using magic loop method 32 stitches per needle and join to work in the round *k1 p1* repeat ribbing for 10 rounds or desired length of cuff begin wisp lace chart on needle a this is the instep of the foot the pattern can be added to the back of the leg as well and looks very pretty just follow the same chart as per needle a for needle b if doing pattern on back of sock it is only worked until you start the heel flap knit 4 stitches pm begin row 1 of chart pm knit 4 repeat for needle b if desired chart is read from bottom up right to left all even row are knit plain heel flap heel flap is knit on needle b the instep stitches on needle a can be left on hold this slipstitch heel is worked flat across 32 stitches the first stitch on every row is slipped repeat 4 row until there are 16 slipped stitches on heel flap edges row 1 ws sl1 purl across turn row 2 rs sl1 *k1 sl1*k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 purl across turn row 4 rs sl1 *k1 sl1*k1 turn short row heel turn continue knitting on needle b for heel flap you will now use short row to turn the heel row 1 sl1 p16 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl1 k3 ssk k1 turn row 3 sl1 p to 1 stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 sl1 k to 1 stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn continue working row 3 & 4 back and forth until all stitches have been worked 18 stitches left gusset pick up 16 stitches under the slipped stitches along the edge of the heel flap join instep stitches and continuing with the chart pattern for instep pick up 16 stitches on other edge of heel flap now continue decreasing every other round as follows round 1 k to last 3 stitches on needle b k2tog k1 k instep in pattern k1 ssk on needle b round 2 k one round even instep is in pattern continue decrease rounds until you have 64 stitches knit foot until 1 25 less than desired foot length continuing with the chart this is a shorter rounded toe please feel free to substitute for your favorite style rounded toe *k6 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k5 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k4 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k3 k2tog* repeat to end of round k2 row *k2 k2tog* repeat
